ValidationRule.description: Users cannot pass from "New" status to "To be approved" or "To be extracted" if the field for the % given (1st, 2nd, 3rd) are not completed and start date too)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($User.B2b_Bypass_Validation_Rules__c), NOT($Permission.Sales_Admin), OR( ISPICKVAL(B2b_Status__c, 'To be Approved'), ISPICKVAL(B2b_Status__c, 'To be Extracted') ), OR( ISBLANK(TEXT(B2b_Percentage_Discount_Premium__c)), ISBLANK(TEXT(B2b_Percentage_Discount_Comfort__c)), ISBLANK(TEXT(B2b_Percentage_Discount_Standard__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can't pass the status to "To be approved" or "To be extracted" if the field for the % given (1st, 2nd, 3rd) are not completed and start date too)
